channel.title: Variable Help
channel.description:
[code]Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Whoopskil. java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: 20 at java.lang.String.getChars(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source) at client.savegame(client.java:18343) at client.logout(client.java:10424) at clickingMost.clicking(clickingMost.java:80) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:15677) at client.packetProcess(client.java:17399) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:309) at process.run(process.java:24) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Error with player 1, Whoopskil java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: 20 at java.lang.String.getChars(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source) at client.savegame(client.java:18343) at client.logout(client.java:10424) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:416) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:408) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:322) at process.run(process.java:24) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20[/code]
Could anyone help me would with this...The last thing I did was try and add a Variable. I did it before and it worked fine. And when I try to do it again with something else, It gives me this when the player logs out. I am wondering if the player can't have more then 1 variable though. Which wouldn't really make sence. So, Ya if you could help me that would be great. Thanks

item.title: Variable Help
item.dc:creator: @Final_Dawn Final Dawn
item.description:
@Final_Dawn wrote:

I figured out a different way to do it =) thanks for the help anyhow, I’ll keep that in mind.

well… u must of added it wrong try and decompile it,… so its all bk to normal then try adding it make sure u add correctly before u save,

item.title: Variable Help
item.dc:creator: @Final_Dawn Final Dawn
item.description:
@Final_Dawn wrote:

Well, I am adding my own custom clan system in, and I tried to add the Variables and i got that error when a character logged out. But Before i made another system(which i am going to release and probably will be a huge hit) That you need a variable in and it worked fine. I searched all the files that have to do with a player for the variable to make sure i got it right and its all perfect but i get that error. It confuses me…

Read full topic
